definition: Misty Poetry, a post-Cultural Revolution poetry movement

sentences.english: And the fairy mistress of dreams is coming towards you, flying through the twilight sky.
sentences.chinese: 仙乡里的梦婆飞过朦胧的天空，向你飞来。

sentences.english: When you are old and grey and full of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 当你老了，白发苍苍，睡意朦胧。

sentences.english: The slatted window-shade casts a film noir shadow on her.
sentences.chinese: 百叶窗帘在她身上投下朦胧的黑色阴影。

sentences.english: The dawns on the top of that mountain are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 长夜躺在你的路边，黎明在朦胧的山后睡眠。

sentences.english: Sam dreamily left the lottery studio.
sentences.chinese: 山姆朦胧左彩票工作室。

sentences.english: Love, is the youth frenzy years round of apricot yellow months, fine but hazy.
sentences.chinese: 爱情，是青春迷乱岁月里的一轮杏黄月，美好而朦胧。

sentences.english: I considered that the painter had no right to paint indistinctly .
sentences.chinese: 我认为画家没有权利油漆朦胧。

sentences.english: The town was Li lights dim, some mixed contact is not clear.
sentences.chinese: 小镇飘漓的灯火，朦胧得有些混触不清。

sentences.english: West Lake seemed blurry, and you could only faintly see half of Su Dike.
sentences.chinese: 西湖看起来朦朦胧胧的，苏堤也只能隐约看到一半。

sentences.english: You now face, and gradually Xili hazy sound inside.
sentences.chinese: 你现在的脸，逐步健全内部西丽朦胧。

sentences.english: Both of the window screens were ashy, you would feel dim when looked out of window.
sentences.chinese: 两个窗纱也灰蒙蒙的，从宿舍向外看朦朦胧胧的感觉。

sentences.english: The vale was wrapped in a dim atmosphere of unnaturalness.
sentences.chinese: 峡谷沉浸在一种不自然的朦胧气氛里。

sentences.english: He flashed pride from filmy eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他朦胧的眼中闪出骄傲的光芒。

sentences.english: Now boars rush in and out of the dusky surf.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，朦胧的冲浪中忽出忽进的是种猪。

sentences.english: It was a hazy afternoon and there stood Pikachu wearing sunglasses.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个朦胧的下午，皮卡丘戴着太阳镜，站在那儿。

sentences.english: We sleepily thought it was the distant thunder.
sentences.chinese: 朦胧中我们以为是远远的雷响。
